sections.heading: Information We collect
paragraphs: 1.1. Personal Information: We may collect personal information that you provide to us voluntarily, including but not limited to your name, email address, phone number, location, and payment information when you sign up for our Services, subscribe to our newsletter, or contact us for support.

1.2. Usage Data: We may collect usage data, including your IP address, browser type, device information, and interactions with our Services, to analyze user behavior, improve our products, and personalize your experience.

1.3. Cookies and Tracking Technologies: We may use cookies, web beacons, and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience, customize content, and gather information about your usage patterns on our website.

sections.heading: How We Use Your Information
paragraphs: 2.1. Providing Services: We use your personal information to deliver the Services, fulfill your requests, process transactions, and communicate with you about your account and updates to our products.
2.2. Improving Services: We analyze usage data to understand user preferences, optimize our products, and develop new features and functionalities to enhance user experience.

2.3. Marketing and Communication: With your consent, we may send promotional emails, newsletters, and marketing communications about our products, services, and special offers. You may opt out of receiving marketing communications at any time.
2.4. Legal Compliance: We may use your information to comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, investigate potential fraud, and enforce our terms of service.

sections.heading: How We Share Your Information
paragraphs: 3.1. Third-Party Service Providers: We may share your personal information with third-party service providers, contractors, and partners who assist us in providing and improving our Services, processing payments, and conducting marketing activities on our behalf.

3.2. Legal Compliance: We may disclose your information in response to legal requests, subpoenas, court orders, or to protect our rights, property, or safety, or the rights, property, or safety of others.

3.3. Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred to a third party as part of the transaction. We will notify you via email or prominent notice on our website of any such change in ownership or control of your personal information.

sections.heading: Data Security
paragraphs: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security of your data.

sections.heading: Data Retention
paragraphs: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.

sections.heading: Your Rights
paragraphs: You have the right to access, update, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also object to the processing of your personal data, restrict its processing, or request data portability. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the contact information provided below.

sections.heading: Children's Privacy
paragraphs: Our Services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18 years of age. If you are a parent or guardian and become aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately.

sections.heading: Changes to this Privacy Policy
paragraphs: We reserve the right to update or revise this Privacy Policy at any time. We will notify you of any material changes to this Privacy Policy by posting the updated version on our website or sending you a notification via email. Your continued use of our Services following the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of such changes.

sections.heading: Contact Us
paragraphs: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at support@fertilize.ai.
